snippet: The Yankees lost Michael Pineda to injury and added no pitchers in trades. But on Wednesday, they will unveil Severino, who will be the youngest pitcher to make a start in the majors this season.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column discusses New York Yankees lineup of pitchers, noting that starters have not been heavily used all season; contends that team, which currently holds first place, can afford to let newcomer Luis Severino start in game against last-place Boston Red Sox when they arrive in Bronx.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees lost Michael Pineda to injury and added no pitchers in trades. But on Wednesday, they will unveil Severino, who will be the youngest pitcher to make a start in the majors this season.

headline.print_headline: Young Pitcher Carries Hopes of Yankees
headline.main: Luis Severino Carries Hopes of Yankees
